description: The sixteen year old princess of Gallia, part of the Randgriz royal family which has traces of the mysterious Valkyria in its lineage. After her parents fell ill she ascended to the throne, though she was not crowned due to her young age. Very reserved in nature, she entrusts much of the affairs of state to her prime minister. However, after a foiled kidnapping attempt, Cordelia`s demeanour begins to change and she becomes more self-confident as a leader.
name: Cordelia gi Randgriz
